column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The service was good. The décor was like a speakeasy or an old French restaurant - a very large bar
column3: and some plain wooden tables  with wooden chairs. They played recorded jazz
column5: like so many hip downtown restaurants
column8: our waitress asked how everything went.  I said very good except for how loud the music was. She leaned over and said "What?". I cracked up.
